publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1351 Des McNulty: Deplorable Treatment of Campbell Martin MSP-That the Parliament endorses the statement attributed to Campbell Martin MSP that the Scottish National Party leadership was not fit to run Scotland; considers that he was simply stating the obvious, and therefore deplores the decision to suspend him.

S2M-1351 Des McNulty: Deplorable Treatment of Campbell Martin MSP-That the Parliament endorses the statement attributed to Campbell Martin MSP that the Scottish National Party leadership was not fit to run Scotland; considers that he was simply stating the obvious, and therefore deplores the decision to suspend him.
S2M-1351 Deplorable Treatment of Campbell Martin MSP (lodged on 20 May 2004) Dr Elaine Murray*, Gordon Jackson*, Michael McMahon*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Jackie Baillie*
S2M-1351 Deplorable Treatment of Campbell Martin MSP (lodged on 20 May 2004) Helen Eadie*
